item.title: Using ML for holiday planning: Summarising Airbnb reviews
item.description: Using ML for holiday planning: Summarising Airbnb reviews Photo by Arno Smit on UnsplashWhen it comes to holiday accommodation, Airbnb is the first avenue that immediately comes to mind. With the popularity of Airbnb, there are thousands of Airbnb places available at most major cities in the world. Even after filtering by the number of people, Airbnb property types, and date of check-in and out, weâ€™re still left with plenty to choose from.
